titleStmt.title: A sermon preacht at St. George's Church at Windsor Septemb. 27. 1685. By Edward Pelling, chaplain to his Grace the Duke of Somerset. Printed by order.
titleStmt.author: Pelling, Edward, d. 1718.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Sam. Keble, at the Turks Head in Fleet-street, and Walter Davis, in Amen Corner,

notesStmt.note: With a preliminary imprimatur leaf, possibly printed as E4.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery ("Early English books, 1641-1700" reel 727, identified as Wing P1099), and the Bodleian Library (reel 1956).
